metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1586 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability was discovered in the PCRE2 library in the compile_xclass_matchingpath() function of the pcre2_jit_compile.c file. This involves a unicode property matching issue in JIT-compiled regular expressions. The issue occurs because the character was not fully read in case-less matching within JIT.

criterions.comment: pcre2 package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
